professional_summary: Experienced full-stack developer with 8+ years of expertise in Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, and modern web technologies. Proven track record of leading development teams and delivering scalable applications for high-growth startups and enterprise clients. Passionate about clean code, test-driven development, and mentoring junior developers.

work_experience.title: Senior Ruby Developer
achievements: Led a team of 5 developers in building a microservices architecture serving 1M+ users
Implemented automated testing pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%
Mentored 3 junior developers and conducted code reviews
Architected RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services
Improved application performance by 40% through database optimization

work_experience.title: Ruby Developer
achievements: Developed customer-facing web applications using Ruby on Rails and React
Collaborated with product team to define technical requirements
Implemented payment processing integration with Stripe API
Built responsive front-end components and maintained 95% test coverage

work_experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
achievements: Built e-commerce platforms for small and medium businesses
Developed custom CMS solutions using Ruby on Rails
Managed client relationships and technical project delivery
Implemented SEO optimization and performance monitoring

work_experience.title: Junior Developer
achievements: Maintained legacy Ruby applications and added new features
Fixed bugs and improved code quality through refactoring
Learned Ruby on Rails best practices and design patterns
Participated in daily standups and sprint planning

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

certifications.name: Ruby Association Certified Ruby Programmer Silver

achievements: Led migration from monolithic to microservices architecture
Reduced customer onboarding time by 50% through automation
Contributed to open-source projects with 500+ GitHub stars
Speaker at RubyConf 2022 - "Scaling Rails Applications"
